MainContent.paragraph: Hello, my name is Nivaldo Dantas — a full-stack developer with a strong academic foundation and practical experience in developing mobile and web applications.
MainContent.continuedSubtitle: Aranouá Project - Federal Institute of Amazonas
MainContent.continuedDesc: Extracurricular activity in partnership between IFAM and Samsung to train, improve, and update students, ensuring constant modernization of skills and knowledge with a focus on performance, including courses in React, React Native, Mobile Programming, Databases, and real projects.
MainContent.internSubtitle: Amazonas State Court of Accounts - TCE/AM
MainContent.internDesc1: Development and maintenance of web applications for internal departments.
MainContent.internDesc2: Participation in the conception of new projects, collaborating with multidisciplinary teams for requirements gathering and feature definition.
MainContent.internDesc3: Implementation of automations to optimize workflows and reduce manual tasks, using scripts and integrations between internal systems.
MainContent.internDesc4: Use of Kanban tools for organization, tracking, and prioritization of tasks, promoting efficiency in workflows.
MainContent.internDesc5: Participation in planning and retrospective meetings, contributing to demand alignment and continuous process improvement.
